Description: The G-400 PRO honors the original 1960s classic “SG” (Solid Guitar) and features Alnico Classic PRO™ humbuckers with push/pull coil-splitting plus Wilkinson™ Vintage Classic Machine Heads. - Classic SG styling in a Cherry finish- Alnico Classic PRO™ Humbuckers with Coil-Tapping- Wilkinson™ Vintage Classic Machine Heads Guitar Set-UpAll Guitars can receive a FREE Pro Setup ($90 value) from our Master Luthier at the request of the buyer.International Customers There is no Warranty on products sold outside the USA.
